description:
What is it: Creates an Intune autopilot profile for enrolling machines using the user-driven method. 
 Simeon Notes: When a device is going to be used by a single user, the user-driven approach ideal. Devices in the Azure AD group 'BUILTIN - Autopilot Devices - User Driven' will be assigned this profile. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/autopilot/user-driven
